metadata.title: CVE-2020-26974 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
When flex-basis was used on a table wrapper, a StyleGenericFlexBasis objectcould have been incorrectly cast to the wrong type. This resulted in a heapuser-after-free, memory corruption, and a potentially exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 84, Thunderbird < 78.6, and FirefoxESR < 78.6.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26974` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 84.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 84.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 84.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '84.0+build3-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
